The Monique Lhuillier Home Fragrance collection brilliantly captures the brand’s glamorous and sophisticated aesthetic as well as Monique’s lifelong love of flowers. Comprised of three enchanting fragrances, the collection includes Citrus Lily, Dolce and Limone.
